response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you given its worth of $800,000 to you. I am offering this exceptional piece to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a chance to secure a remarkable asset at a premium yet favorable rate. I look forward to discussing the details with you and hope to facilitate this transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 950000}
